product.name: Abstract Modern Picture Wall Art: Blue Artwork Painting on Canvas for Office Living Room (45'' x 30'', Multiple Sizes)
product.description: This artful modern abstract canvas wall art showcases a contemporary abstract image in blue and gray hues that blend easily with a variety of home decor. A perfect blue abstract wall artwork for modern and contemporary arrangements. Modern Painting for Wall: Giclee artwork, printed on high quality archival grade canvas, exclusive canvas stretching technique hides corner folds and provides a taut canvas surface.
